structure.unit: ARTICLE III. CERTIFICATES OF PUBLIC CONVENIENCE AND NECESSITY

text.section:
Sec. 32-34. Public systems.
Any municipality owning or operating a water or sewer system on the effective date of this chapter shall be entitled to receive a certificate of public convenience for the service area actually being served by such municipally owned or operated system as a matter of right, without cost or expense to such municipality, upon the filing of an appropriate application for certificate within the period of time herein specified. Such certificate shall be issued without notice and without public hearing.
